name: Imbalanced
description:
Overview

Imbalanced is a species simulation game, where your goal is to keep all species from going extinct for as long as you possibly can. As time goes on you unlock godly abilities that help you on you this quest.

Ludum Dare

This game was developed over the course of 48h in LuduDare40 Compo mode. The theme of this event was "The more you have, the worse it is".

Have fun!

Developer

Lawrence Lazauskas  |  @sleepy_byte
